sentences.en: A deformable layer theory does not appear to be tenable in glass - reinforced composites.
sentences.cn: 变形层理论在玻璃增强复合材料中说服力不强.

sentences.en: an idea which is no longer tenable
He's got a scholarship tenable for four years.
sentences.cn: 他已得到为期四年的奖学金.
他的新理论是站得住脚的.

sentences.en: How long is the post tenable for?
If it is tenable, how much is the dumping range?
sentences.cn: 如果成立, 倾销幅度是 多少 ?

sentences.en: In a word, our theory is tenable.
sentences.cn: 综上所述, 我们的理论成立.

sentences.en: In some situations, this assumption may not be tenable.
sentences.cn: 在一些情况下, 这种假设可能不成立的.

sentences.en: Overall, at the legal level, this ruling is tenable.
sentences.cn: 总体而言, 在法律层面, 这个裁决是站得住脚的.

sentences.en: Second, by related profession tenable Bonding company for small and medium - sized enterprise guarantee.
sentences.cn: 二是由相关行业成立的担保公司为 中小企业 担保.

sentences.en: The lectureship is tenable for a period of three years.
sentences.cn: 讲师这一职位任期三年.

sentences.en: The old idea that this work was not suitable for women was no longer tenable.
sentences.cn: 认为这种工作不适合妇女的旧想法再也站不住脚了。

sentences.en: The theory which is once again put forth, that the Germans as such are inherently vicious, is hardly tenable and not very creditable to those who hold it.
sentences.cn: 那个再一次被提出的理论，即德国人天生就那样邪恶，是很难站得住脚的，并且对持有这一理论的那些人是非常不值得称道的。

sentences.en: The view that the earth is flat is no longer tenable.
sentences.cn: 认为地球是平的这一观点站不住脚了.

sentences.en: This argument is simply not tenable.
sentences.cn: 这个论点根本站不住脚。

sentences.en: This is a tenable approach and will do us much good.

words.tran_cn: （主张等）站得住脚的；可维持的

trans.tran_cn: 守得住的，可防守的，站得住脚的，合理的
trans.tran_en: a belief, argument etc that is tenable is reasonable and can be defended successfully
